requirement.data

Class RequirementText

  • java.lang.Object
    • requirement.data.RequirementText

  • public class RequirementText
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure to hold the text of a single requirement
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String implementerEnhanced
      richtext based on the plaintext with special formatting intended for easier implementation (based on NLP analysis)
      private java.lang.String raw
      raw plaintext without any formatting
      private java.lang.String rich
      richtext with all formatting applied
      private java.lang.String richWithTraceTags
      richtext + human-readable trace tags; used for tables

    • Constructor Summary

      Ordinary constructor
      RequirementText(java.lang.String raw, java.lang.String rich, java.lang.String richWithTraceTags)
      Constructor for table cells
